name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 4, Shenyang Zhongshan Park
People mourn Li Keqiang under the statue of Sun Yat-sen
After an hour the flowers disappeared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 4, at the Anji Dalu Youth Music Festival, a fan collided with a police officer while dancing and then got into an argument, and was subsequently taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It was reported online that a villager in Huilong Village, Xinning County, Hunan Province, had an argument with the village committee secretary and stabbed him to death.
The video was taken by a female village committee member at the scene and posted in the village group to call for help.
It was reported online that the incident happened on April 1.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the "Guangzhou Urban Village Renovation Regulations" passed by the Guangzhou People's Congress on March 30, villagers will have no decision-making power over Guangzhou's demolition compensation plans in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Now, the system shows that Meituan can already order flowers to Li Keqiang's former residence at 80 Hongxing Road, Hefei - but after placing the order, the store will receive a call from the police, asking for the location of the flower shop and the information of the person who placed the order. So the store will call and hope that the customer can change the delivery address.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 2, in Fengzhen, Ulanqab, Inner Mongolia, a family returned to their hometown to visit their ancestors’ graves during the Qingming Festival, only to find that their ancestral graves had been dug up by the government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The person involved told the story. I hope someone can translate it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the Anji Dalu Youth Music Festival, a woman had an argument with a man who claimed to be a policeman because she was carrying a flag and signing on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of April 4, an explosion occurred at a barbecue restaurant on Jinma Road, Gaoyao District, Zhaoqing City, Guangdong Province. According to media reports, the accident injured three passers-by.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 4, Fushun, Liaoning. Netizens posted a video saying that in front of the Monument to the People's Heroes, the flowers that children presented to the martyrs were thrown into the trash as soon as they left.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The current situation of Hongxing Road in Hefei on April 5.
In addition to the police everywhere, there are many plainclothes officers wearing headphones on the roadside.
The owner of the nearby flower shop and the volunteers at the door will dissuade people from buying flowers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 4, in Heyuan, Guangdong, the owners of Hengda Yayuan protested their rights outside the Heyuan Municipal People's Government due to housing issues. During the protest, some owners were forcibly pinned to the ground by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Yao'an County, Chuxiong, Yunnan, an urban management officer pinned an old man to the ground while enforcing the law. During the enforcement, a female urban management officer stepped on the back of the old man's hand and was pushed away by onlookers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 5, a post about the mayor of Hualien County wearing a vest with his own name printed on it while personally on the front line of disaster relief sparked discussion among netizens inside the Great Firewall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 5, a woman in Guangdong Province posted a video to report China Merchants Bank Zhongshan Branch under her real name. She said that she had borrowed 30 million yuan from the bank in 2014, but she has not received a penny so far, but she still has to repay the loan. She has complained everywhere over the years, but none of them have been resolved. During this period, China Merchants Bank was afraid of being exposed and asked her to withdraw the lawsuit. Later, the bank sold the bonds to a private person, and the new creditor auctioned the woman's villa in Shanghai on March 27 this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 5, the media confirmed that the incident had occurred and that the injured person was indeed the village secretary surnamed Li. As for whether the secretary had died, the villagers said it was inconvenient to disclose. The local police station said that the police had been dispatched that day, and the details were subject to the notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 5, Yantai, Shandong.
A woman posted a video saying that her warehouse was demolished by the government. She had previously communicated with the demolition office leaders and planned to move out in six days. However, on the fourth day, all the furniture in her warehouse was smashed and thrown downstairs.
The demolition office did not admit that it was their doing. But later, she found that some of her lost furniture appeared in the office of the demolition office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Heroic Martyrs Law"
The same scene happened in Chengdu, Sichuan.
On April 4, in front of the People's Park Monument and the Sichuan Army Statue, the flowers that the public had placed to commemorate the revolutionary martyrs on Qingming Festival were taken away in public by the management staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Co0KRzL6xp

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 5, a white car was reportedly driving in the opposite direction and crashed into two electric bicycles near Xisanqi North Road in Haidian District, Beijing.
